name: Ogre Zombie
languages: Understands Common and Giant but can't speak  them

specialAbilities.name: Undead Fortitude
specialAbilities.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
